channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Reflections With Fr. Leo Clifford
channel.desc: Father Leo Clifford discusses the theme of harboring grudges, resentments, gossip and other nasty habits that are disastrous to us personally and to all the others involved. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Explore With The Miracle Hunter
channel.desc: The story behind Ireland's greatest female saint. Known for her generosity, Brigid consecrated herself to Jesus and sparked the light of faith that still illuminates Ireland today. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Nicaragua: ?lord, Grant Us Peace?
channel.desc: Follow Catholic leadership and youth in the fall-out of pension reform in Nicaragua, to know the ongoing political repression, efforts for peace, and suffering of the faithful. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Adventure Catechism
channel.desc: Learn about Baptism, the amazing sacrament that cleanses us from Original Sin, and makes us members of Christ. And see how the sacrament of Confirmation empowers us to change the world just like the Apostles did. (15 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Hi Lucy
channel.desc: Sister Grace Explains to Lucy that this is one of the seven virtues, a charitable behavior is always something practiced by saints and we should follow their example. (16 minutes).[(96057)]
